Your salary is discussed and presented in the offer you received while being hired. Your salary compensation must not be shared with anyone except your manager. All possible promotions are discussed with the manager as well. As a rule, promotion depends on your level. Performance review is a standard procedure that can have some local peculiarities. This procedure is described in our Employee
